mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.to_user AS "toUser", a.company_id AS "companyId", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.create_id AS "createId", a.create_name AS "createName", a.create_date AS "createDate"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO busi_message( id, title, content, to_user, company_id, company_name, create_id, create_name, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{toUser}, #{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{createId}, #{createName}, #{createDate} )
